numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a difference between players of color and head coaches of color in major sports leagues.
2. In major sports leagues, the percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of head coaches of color.
3. The Women’s National Basketball Association is a major sports league.
4. The National Basketball Association is a major sports league.
5. The Women’s National Basketball Association has 83 percent players of color.
6. The National Basketball Association has 83 percent players of color.
7. Major League Baseball is a major sports league.
8. Major League Baseball has 40 percent players of color.
9. The National Football League is a major sports league.
10. Major League Soccer is a major sports league.
11. The National Football League has 13 percent head coaches of color.
12. Major League Soccer has 41 percent coaches of color.
13. There are five major sports leagues.
14. I wonder why the percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of coaches of color in the five major sports leagues.
15. I ask whether this difference reflects the number of players on each team.
16. I ask whether this difference reflects the number of coaching positions.
17. The National Football League has a high percentage of players of color.
18. The National Football League has a low percentage of coaches of color.
19. I wonder why the National Football League has a high percentage of players of color and a low percentage of coaches of color.
20. These graphs demonstrate something to me.
21. These graphs demonstrate something to my community.
22. Systemic racism exists for people of color.
23. Obstacles exist for people of color.
24. More barriers prevent people of color from becoming coaching staff than from becoming players.
25. I believe that this reflects a systemic preference.
26. The systemic preference favors non-people of color for leadership positions.
27. This systemic preference needs to be abolished.
28. The headline is: Leadership Diversity Eludes Major League Sports.
